\documentclass[11pt,twoside,a4paper]{report}

%Include bibliography in table of contents
\usepackage[nottoc,numbib]{tocbibind}
\usepackage{graphicx}
\usepackage{svg}

% Custom commands
%\newcommand{\userTitle}{XX-DOCUMENT-TITLE-XX}
%\newcommand{\userAuthor}{XX-AUTHOR-XX}
%\newcommand{\userDate}{\today}
%\newcommand{\userSubject}{XX-SUBJECT-XX}
%\newcommand{\userKeywords}{XX-KEYWORDS-XX}

\newcommand{\clearemptydoublepage}{
  \newpage{\pagestyle{empty}\cleardoublepage}
}

% Improve page geometry
\usepackage{geometry}
\geometry{
  a4paper,
  top=2cm,
  bottom=2.5cm,
  left=2.5cm,
  right=2.5cm
}
%\usepackage{showframe}

% Improve page style
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}
\fancypagestyle{StandardPageStyle}{
  \fancyhf{}
  \fancyhead[RE,LO]{\leftmark}
  \fancyfoot[RE,LO]{\userTitle}
  \fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}
}


%Sort out chapter head page styles
\fancypagestyle{plain}{
  \fancyhf{}
  \fancyfoot[RE,LO]{\userTitle}
  \fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}
}

%Sort out chapter blank page styles
\fancypagestyle{empty}{
  \fancyhf{}
  \fancyfoot[RE,LO]{\userTitle}
  \fancyfoot[LE,RO]{\thepage}
}

\pagestyle{StandardPageStyle}

% PDF and hyperlink setup (required, but should be loaded last)
\usepackage[pdftex,
            pdfauthor=\userAuthor,
            pdftitle=\userTitle,
            pdfsubject=\userSubject,
            pdfkeywords=\userKeywords,
            pagebackref=true,
            colorlinks=true,
            linkcolor=black,
            citecolor=black,
            unicode]{hyperref}
%Setup title/author etc...
\title{\userTitle}
\author{\userAuthor}

\begin{document}
\hypersetup{pageanchor=false,
             bookmarksnumbered=true,
             pdfencoding=unicode
            }
\input{\template/cover.tex}
\clearemptydoublepage
\tableofcontents
\clearemptydoublepage

%\input{chapter.tex}
%\clearemptydoublepage
%\bibliographystyle{plain}
%\bibliography{library.bib}
%\end{document}
